author: publisher12
title: JIPMER Recruitment 2017 – 99 Sr Resident & Teaching Posts

organizations.name: jawaharlal institute of post graduate medical education & research

text: Click here for Teaching Post Details JIPMER Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for 75 Senior Resident Posts: Jawaharlal Institute of Post Graduate Medical Education & Research (JIPMER) has issued a notification for the recruitment of 75 Senior Resident vacancies in various disciplines on regular basis. Eligible candidates may attend for walk in written test/ interview from 15-02-2017 to 16-02-2017 at 08.30 AM. Other details like   process, application fee   below… JIPMER Vacancy Details: Name of the Post: Senior Resident 1. UR: 37 Posts 3. SC: 11 Posts 4. ST: 10 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age should be not exceeding 33 years for those having Post Graduate qualification & not exceeding 35 years for Post-Doctoral Degree holders (DM/ M.Ch) as on the date of interview. For Age relaxation details refer the notification.   Candidates should have passed Postgraduate Medical Degree (MD/ MS/ DNB) in respective discipline from recognized university/ Institute. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on written test & interview. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 500/- for General & OBC candidates, Rs. 250/- for SC/ ST candidates demand draft drawn in favour of “The Director, JIPMER, Puducherry-06,”. No fee for Persons with Disabilities. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may attend for walk in written test/ interview with an application in the prescribed format, one set of Self-attested copy of all relevant certificates as mentioned in the notification clearly & originals, demand draft from 15-02-2017 to 16-02-2017 at 08.30 AM. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: from 15-02-2017 to 16-02-2017 at 08.30 AM. Venue: Hunter Theatre, Ground Floor, Institute Block, Jipmer , Puducherry-06.   vacancy details, qualification, experience, pay scale   below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form - JIPMER Recruitment 2017 – Teaching Posts: Jawaharlal Institute of Post Graduate Medical Education & Research (JIPMER), Ministry of Health & Family welfare, Puducherry has issued a notification for the recruitment of Professor, Assistant Professor vacancies in various disciplines on contract basis. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed format on or before 31-01-2017 at 04.30 PM. Other details like age limit,   process, application fee   below… JIPMER Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 24 Name of the Posts: A. Community Medicine: 01 Post B. Medicine: 01 Post C. Obst & Gynae: 01 Post D. Pathology: 01 Post
